items.sentence: Tom can\'t put up with Mary\'s behavior any longer.
Tom hasn\'t been to the supermarket in a long time.
Tom hasn\'t even started studying for the exam yet.
I want you to say you\'re not going back to Boston.
I wanted to make sure we didn\'t cause the problem.
Tom and Mary aren\'t talking to each other anymore.
If you go to the movies, take your sister with you.
I haven\'t yet read the book you\'re talking about.
You must consider what kind of work you want to do.
Were you going to the train station when I saw you?
